    AmountBought - Variable in class StockMarket
    Total number of shares bought in the current tick.
    amountField - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Input field where the user specifies the number of shares to buy or sell in a simulated trade.
    AmountSold - Variable in class StockMarket
    Total number of shares sold in the current tick.
    ArrowPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    ArrowPanel is a custom Swing panel used in the stock market simulation GUI.
    ArrowPanel(StockMarket) - Constructor for class ArrowPanel
    Constructs the ArrowPanel with all visualization and control components initialized.
    avalibleShares - Variable in class StockMarket
    The number of shares currently available for trading in the market.
    AVGAvalibleShares() - Method in class Stock
    Calculates the average number of available shares recorded in the history.
